description: Aiko ChatGPT is a web app that allows you to play with AikoAI's ChatGPT API
sourceCode: AikoAI is a closed source , Hope you don't mind this !!!

support.title: Support
support.paragraph1: At Aiko ChatGPT, we strive to provide you with useful and amazing features around the clock. And just like any project, your support and motivation will be instrumental in helping us keep moving forward!
support.paragraph2: If you would like to support me, consider sponsoring us through one of the methods below. Every contribution, no matter how small, helps us to maintain and improve our service.
support.paragraph3: Thank you for being a part of our community, and we look forward to serving you better in the future.

telegramServer.title: Telegram Server
telegramServer.paragraph1: Currently we do not provide Telegram bot for free it is just a test version and update soonest.
telegramServer.paragraph2: To join our server, simply click on the following link: <0>https://t.me/aiko_ai_bot</0>. We can't wait to see you there!

privacyStatement.title: Privacy Statement
privacyStatement.paragraph1: We highly value your privacy and are committed to safeguarding the privacy of our users. We do not collect or store any text you enter or receive from the AikoAi server in any form. Our source code is available for your inspection to verify this statement.
privacyStatement.paragraph2: We prioritise the security of your API key and handle it with utmost care. If you use your own API key, your key is exclusively stored on your browser and never shared with any third-party entity. It is solely used for the intended purpose of accessing the AikoAI API and not for any other unauthorised use.
